law.catch_line: Criteria for issuance of license -- Appeal.

text.section: No license shall be granted to any person who has been convicted of a misdemeanor involving any controlled substance or who has been convicted of any felony.
The Cabinet for Health and Family Services may suspend or revoke any license for cause.
Upon appeal of any action taken under authority of this section, an administrative hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
